abstract: The Upshot; user-generated diet and exercise tracking service MyFitnessPal reports that Sweethearts Conversation Hearts, small candy hearts emblazoned with messages, is popular seasonal treat on Valentine's Day, even though many people say they dislike taste; candy's maker, New England Confectionery Company, follows trend and only sells them during Valentine season.
lead_paragraph: One food is overwhelmingly associated with Feb. 14: those old-fashioned chalky-textured hearts with corny messages printed on them.

headline.main: The Big Valentine Food That Isn’t Chocolate
headline.print_headline: The Big Valentine Food That Isn’t Chocolate

snippet: One food is overwhelmingly associated with Feb. 14: those old-fashioned chalky-textured hearts with corny messages printed on them.
